description: Pressure pass wrapping around opponent's torso with body lock grip neutralizing guard
key_points: Underhook near side|Wrap far side with body lock|Clasp hands under scapula|Tripod and pass with pressure
common_mistakes: Loose grip|Hips too high|No pressure|Opponent re-guarding

description: Classic pressure pass pinning one leg while underhooked the other
key_points: Pin one leg to mat|Underhook other leg|Switch head toward underhooked leg|Drive forward at angle
common_mistakes: Not pinning|Head wrong side|No pressure|Opponent escaping

description: Pressure pass swimming both arms inside legs and stacking opponent on shoulders
key_points: Swim both arms inside legs|Grip near belt or hips|Stack hips over shoulders|Sprawl and pass at angle
common_mistakes: Submitted from bottom|Not controlling hips|No stack|Loose arms

description: Heavy pressure pass folding opponent's legs together and driving through
key_points: From over-under or split legs|Fold legs together|Drive knees toward chest|Sprawl to pin both legs

description: Highest percentage pass slicing knee across thigh to pass guard
key_points: Collar + pants grip or collar tie|Slice knee DOWN toward mat|Control opposite shoulder|Prevent underhook
common_mistakes: Slicing backward|No shoulder control|Giving underhook|Slow cut

description: Knee slice variation backstopping when standard is blocked by RDLR
key_points: When RDLR blocks knee slice|Backstep around the hook|Continue pass from new angle|Complete to side control
common_mistakes: Poor timing|Losing position|Caught in RDLR|Slow backstep

description: Continuing knee slice momentum straight to mount rather than side control
key_points: From knee slice position|Continue momentum through|Slide to mount|Establish mount control
common_mistakes: Stopping at side|Losing control|Too slow|Opponent escaping

description: Speed pass gripping legs and circling around like a bullfighter
key_points: Grip opponent's ankles or knees|Pin legs to floor|Circle around in bullfighter motion|Drop shoulder to complete

description: Speed pass dragging opponent's leg across your own to pin and pass
key_points: Control foot and knee of other leg|Drag leg across your hip|Sit to trap leg|Complete to side control

description: Speed pass from headquarters crossing arms while kicking leg and stepping around
key_points: From headquarters one in one out|Push knee down|Kick near leg up|Arms cross in X pattern land KOB

description: Speed pass from knee slice kicking trapped leg UP then stepping away
key_points: From knee slice position|Kick trapped leg UP vertical|Long step away from legs|Land in reverse scarf hold
common_mistakes: Not kicking up first|Slow step|Caught in half|Opponent following

description: Athletic pass cartwheeling over seated guard to take back or pass
key_points: Against seated guard|Step outside leg|Cartwheel over controlling wrist|Land behind for back take

description: Techniques for passing De La Riva guard breaking the hook first
key_points: Break DLR hook point knee out|Bump thigh back|Enter headquarters|Side smash or knee cut

description: Passing reverse De La Riva guard with pressure or speed variations
key_points: X-pass pressure variation|Or long step up first then away|Break hook with knee pressure|Complete pass

description: Passing spider guard by breaking sleeve grips first priority
key_points: Break sleeve grips|Duck under extended leg|Or get double unders|Neutralize bicep control

description: Passing butterfly guard by driving flat or body lock before hooks engage
key_points: Drive opponent flat|Don't let sit up|Body lock or long step as back hits|Neutralize hooks

description: Breaking open closed guard to begin passing sequence
key_points: Stand up with one foot forward|Push knee down|Step back when open|Wedge knee between legs

description: Passing Keenan Cornelius worm guard by stripping lapel or pressuring through
key_points: Establish far collar control early|Strip lapel grip|Or pressure through with wide base|Low hips
common_mistakes: Caught in worm|No collar control|Swept|Not stripping

description: Passing lasso guard by breaking or ducking under the lasso wrap
key_points: Strip lasso grip|Duck under wrapped leg|Or pass over|Neutralize wrap

description: Fundamental techniques to pass half guard extracting trapped leg
key_points: Crossface and hip pressure|Free knee clearing hook|Or knee cut through|Complete to side control

description: Control position with one knee in one out ready for multiple passing options
key_points: One knee inside guard|One knee outside|Posture up controlling|Ready to pass multiple ways

description: Pressure pass weaving legs together for control while passing
key_points: Weave legs together|Control hips|Heavy pressure|Pass around

description: Light pressure passing floating over guard legs staying mobile
key_points: Stay light on guard|Float over legs|Quick direction changes|Complete to side control

description: Core concepts for all pressure passing: head position and hip control
key_points: Control hips|Heavy chest pressure|Cut angles|Maintain connection

description: Core concepts for speed passing: grip breaking and direction changes
key_points: Break grips first|Quick direction|Don't stop moving|Complete pass

description: Pinning both legs together and passing around with heavy pressure
key_points: Pin both legs|Heavy pressure|Walk around|Complete to side control

description: Passing knee shield/Z-guard by smashing through or going around
key_points: Smash through shield|Or go around|Neutralize frame|Complete pass

description: Passing X-guard by stepping over or disengaging the position
key_points: Step over hooks|Or disengage and reset|Don't get swept|Complete pass

description: Extracting from 50/50 position and passing to dominant position
key_points: Extract leg|Or invert out|Avoid leg attacks|Complete pass

description: Passing single leg X/ashi garami by stepping over or extracting leg
key_points: Step over hooks|Pressure down|Extract leg|Complete pass immediately
